summary: The video discusses individuals who have changed their last names to avoid being associated with their famous family members. It mentions Malia Obama using 'Malia Ann' for her directorial debut at Sundance, Angelina Jolie's full birth name, Stephen 'T.I.' Gordy's real name, Sky Blue's real name as Skylar Gordy, and Nicolas Cage's stage name change from Coppola to avoid being teased about his famous uncle, Francis Ford Coppola.
keywords: Nepo babies, Malia Obama, Angelina Jolie, Stephen Gordy, Sky Blue, Nicolas Cage, Francis Ford Coppola, Sundance Film Festival, Fast Times at Ridgemont High
